review: This works great for me and so far I have not had any problems with it. I plan to buy another one.
author: Amazon Customer "richr"

review: It would've been a great asset to my home entertaining system BUT it was compatable with my router & I wasn't about to change the system I have for one thing. I wish the network preferences were more clear PRIOR to purchase. Instead I purchased a Roku stick & it works great!
author: christi love

review: I can't say if I like it or not. Prime stopped. So when I don't have prime I don't use. Just  expensive screensaver
author: Linda W.

review: My son got me a fire stick for Christmas. It worked well until April and then I wasn't able to get it to work. Just kept getting error messages. He bought us a new one a few weeks ago. So far it seems to work fine. How can I send back the one that doesn't work?
author: Mary A Moeller

review: I absolutely love it..it is the coolest thing. I use it for everything
author: Danny bacosa
